lead_paragraph: ACCIDENT.--On Wednesday a man by the name of Michael Murphy, while at work under the bank on Bergen Hill, where it is being cut away to extend Court street, was seriously injured by the bank falling upon him. It appears a large rock in the mass of dirt, struck him, breaking both of his legs and otherwise injuring him. He was taken to his residence in Gowanus in a very critical state.

headline.main: BROOKLYN.; ACCIDENT. GERMAN HUSSARS THE FIRE IN FLATBUSH WOODS
